Public Structure OracleMonthSpan Implements IComparable, INullable
public value class OracleMonthSpan : IComparable, System::Data::SqlTypes::INullable

summary.span: 表示用月份表示的时间间隔，并对应于 Oracle 9i 数据类型。

span.span: Represents a time interval in months and corresponds to the Oracle 9i data type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Oracle`INTERVAL YEAR TO MONTH`数据类型 (Oracle 9i 或更高版本) 包含的年和月中的时间间隔和具有固定的大小的 5 个字节。The Oracle `INTERVAL YEAR TO MONTH` data type (Oracle 9i or later) contains an interval of time in years and months, and has a fixed size of 5 bytes. 若要获取对象，请调用方法。To obtain an object, call the method.
